comment: Always had issue with auto enhace feature, it adds a lot of tint to the photos. (it is funny that the thubnail for the enhancement looks good, but it is not what you get when you apply it). The new update has a weird UI and the placement of controls are not user friendly, and looks toy-ish. Liked the old interface with all the slider controls in one place.
key sentence: Use of the auto enhance feature: Upon using the auto enhance feature, the user observes that it adds a lot of tint to the photos. Additionally, the thumbnail for the enhancement looks good, but the actual result when applied does not match the thumbnail.
the function of activity: An image editing tool with functions to search contacts, open menus, apply blur, remove parts, edit sky, switch tabs, cancel, save, adjust, add text, rotate, resize, adjust brightness, apply filters, undo, and redo.
